item.title: Spade Help
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hey Guys,

I’m using a devolution 7.0 server source and have recently added a spade although i have the teleport and all i need help with making the spade only work in a certain area.

This is the code:

case 952: addItem(952, 1); if (absX == 3562 && absY == 3291) { setAnimation(1064); teleportToX = 3568; teleportToY = 9677; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("You Lost your spade upon digging into the Barrows"); AnimationReset = true; updateRequired = true; break; } else { sendMessage("Nothing Intresting Happen."); resetPos(); break; }

Read full topic
